alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 23 at 11:17AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana, including the following areas, in central Montana, Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Little Belt and Highwood Mountains and Meagher County Valleys. In north central Montana, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys
